task_description:
# User Prompts Organization System

Implement the user_prompts table and UI for saving, organizing, and reusing prompts. Allow users to create folders, add tags, and quickly search their prompt library.

## Rationale
Power users create hundreds of prompts during a project. Without organization, they waste time recreating prompts or searching through history. This addresses the repetitive prompt work pain point shared across all competitors (pain-1-4, pain-3-4).

## User Stories
- As a storyboard artist, I want to save my best prompts so that I can reuse them for similar scenes
- As a comic creator, I want to organize prompts by project so that I can quickly find the right prompt for each series

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Users can save prompts with custom names and descriptions
- [ ] Users can organize prompts into folders
- [ ] Users can add tags to prompts for filtering
- [ ] Quick search finds prompts by name, content, or tags
- [ ] One-click loads saved prompt into Shot Creator
